import React from 'react'; import { useShopping } from './Shopping'; function Sepet() { const { items } = useShopping(); return (
{items.map((item) =>
 Back
in {product.category}
{product.title}
Rating {product.rating && product.rating.rate}
${product.price}

{product.description}

{ findShopping ? : }
)}
) } export default Sepet;
